This includes custom web shells such as BUSHWALK, CHAINLINE, FRAMESTING, and a variant ofLIGHTWIRE. "CHAINLINE is a Python web shell backdoor that is
    CISA Warns of Active Exploitation of Critical Vulnerability in iOS, iPadOS, and macOS
    The U.S. Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA) on Wednesdayaddeda high-severity flaw impacting iOS, iPadOS, macOS, tvOS, and watchOS to its Known Exploited Vulnerabilities (KEV) catalog, based on evidence of active exploitation.     Medieval castles stood as impregnable fortresses for centuries, thanks to their meticulous design. Fast forward to the digital age, and this medieval wisdom still echoes in cybersecurity. Like castles with strategic layouts to withstand attacks, the Defense-in-Depth strategy is the modern counterpart a multi-layered approach with strategic redundancy and a blend of passive and active security

    The agreement to enable future sharing of information and experience is part of a spate of inter-country threat intelligence agreements that Israel is signing, as war-related attacks ramp up.  ( 14 min )
